abstract contract provides the core logic for Universal NFTs. It is designed      to be imported into an OpenZeppelin-based ERC721 implementation, extending its      functionality with cross-chain NFT transfer capabilities via GatewayEVM. This      contract facilitates cross-chain NFT transfers to and from EVM-based networks.      It's important to set the universal contract address before making cross-chain transfers.","errors":{"ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,address)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. onCall((address),bytes).details: Called by the Gateway upon receiving a message.

params.message: The encoded message containing information about the NFT.

returns._0: A constant indicating the function was successfully handled.

onRevert((address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Called by the Gateway if a call fails.

params.context: The revert context containing metadata and revert message.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGasLimit(uint256).details: Can only be called by the contract owner.

setGateway(address).details: Can only be called by the contract owner.

params.gatewayAddress: The address of the gateway contract.

setUniversal(address).details: Can only be called by the contract owner.

params.contractAddress: The address of the universal contract.

returns._0: True if the interface is supported, false otherwise.
The token URI as a string.

transferCrossChain(uint256,address,addre.details: Burns the NFT locally, then uses the Gateway to send a message to      mint the same NFT on the destination chain. If the destination is the zero      address, transfers the NFT to ZetaChain.

params.destination: The ZRC-20 address of the gas token of the destination chain.
params.receiver: The address on the destination chain that will receive the NFT.
params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to transfer.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

onCall((address),bytes).notice: Mint an NFT in response to an incoming cross-chain transfer.

onRevert((address,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Mint an NFT and send it back to the sender if a cross-chain transfer fails.

setGasLimit(uint256).notice: Sets the gas limit for cross-chain transfers.

setGateway(address).notice: Sets the EVM gateway contract address.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if the contract supports a specific interface.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Gets the token URI for a given token ID.

transferCrossChain(uint256,address,addre.notice: Transfers an NFT to another chain.
